name: Seeking Signal (PolyJam)
description:
You play as a TV electronic who is a performer! when traveling to his next show he fell out, He has to climb a mountain to find his way back! =========================================

 Controls: 

Movement - arrow keys & space

Dash - Z 

Powerup - X 

Pause - P 

(Can be changed)

Notes and Credits

 Polyjam 2022 July
